Incentives are transparent and non-punitive: you can see exactly how rewards are calculated, and the most value accrues to those who are consistent, not those who can game the system. The reward structure isnâ€™t just â€œdo X, get Y.â€ Itâ€™s a system that recognizes effort and continuity, not just perfection. Miss a test window because you had a rough month?
